features.featureTitle: Audit all frontend components (TokenomicsSection, TickerBanner, HeroSection, AboutSection, HowToBuySection, Navigation, CommunitySection, Footer, and any other files) and remove every visible instance of '0% tax', '0 percent tax', '0% buy & sell tax', 'zero tax', or any equivalent phrasing referencing a 0% tax rate. This includes card labels, badge text, ticker phrases, tooltips, and body copy. Do not replace removed text with alternative tax copy â€” simply omit it entirely.
